content: flora flamingo is an adorable tropical bird that works up quickly it is a beginner-friendly doll that can sit on its own making it a great home decor item for nursery and kids rooms this stuffed animal toy is also great as a children s birthday present or baby shower gift for both boys and girls other gifting occasions include valentine s day or the christmas holiday it is recommended to use super bulky chenille velvet or blanket yarn for a soft plush look it can also look great in acrylic or cotton yarns and can be turned into a smaller size with worsted weight or thinner weights the pdf pattern includes photo references as well as a link to a video tutorial for the legs **size ** height 10 inches 25 cm **level ** ★★☆☆☆ beginner/easy requires familiarity with stitches used below **stitches/terms us terms ** fo = fasten_off chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet increase = increase insert 2 single_crochet in same st decrease = decrease single_crochet 2 sts together half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet **materials ** honey bunny yarn super bulky 6 in pink white and grey 5mm crochet hook 12mm plastic safety eyes x2 stuffing scissors yarn needle *this pattern is © 2023 sweet softies for personal use only you may not translate copy alter or sell this pattern in any way you may not make a video or teach a class using my patterns without my written consent you may sell finished items made with this pattern if you credit sweet softies as the designer and link to my blog www sweetsofties com no wholesale * www instagram com/sweetsofties @sweetsofties www etsy com/shop/sylemn www facebook com/sweetsofties www youtube com/sweetsofties www pinterest com/sweetsofties
